烟がる: (けぶがる) - to be sensitive to smoke; to be uncomfortable because of smoke
烟たい: (けぶたい) - smoky; awkward/ill at ease
烟たがる: (けぶたがる) - to be sensitive to smoke; to dislike the company of (someone)/to consider (someone) a burden or nuisance
烟に巻く: (けむりにまく) - to confuse someone; to befuddle someone; to create a smokescreen
烟る: (けぶる) - to smoke (e.g. fire); to be hazy
烟突: (えんとつ) - chimney/smokestack/funnel (of a ship)/stovepipe; carrying a passenger without turning on the taximeter
烟筒: (えんとう) - chimney; kiseru/Japanese smoking pipe
烟管: (えんかん) - kiseru/Japanese smoking pipe; fire tube (of a fire-tube boiler); chimney
烟草: (タバコ) - tobacco (por: tabaco)/cigarette/cigaret/cigar; tobacco plant (Nicotiana tabacum)
烱々: (けいけい) - glaring (e.g. eyes); piercing; penetrating
烱烱: (けいけい) - glaring (e.g. eyes); piercing; penetrating
烹炊所: (ほうすいじょ) - galley; ship's kitchen
烹炊煙突: (ほうすいえんとつ) - galley stovepipe
烽火: (ほうか) - beacon/skyrocket/signal fire/smoke signals; starting shot/starting signal
焔摩天: (えんまてん) - Yama (as protector deity of the south in esoteric Buddhism)
焙じる: (ほうじる) - to roast (i.e. tea leaves)
焙ずる: (ほうずる) - to roast (i.e. tea leaves)
焙り出し: (あぶりだし) - invisible writing revealed by applying heat; writing done in invisible ink
焙り出す: (あぶりだす) - to bring into the open; to reveal; to uncover (e.g. evidence); to bring to light
焙る: (あぶる) - to warm (i.e. one's hands over a fire)/to dry; to scorch/to broil/to toast/to grill
焙烙: (ほうろく) - earthenware baking pan; parching pan
焙焼: (ばいしょう) - roasting (in metallurgy, etc.); calcination; torrefaction
焚きつける: (たきつける) - to kindle/to build a fire; to instigate/to stir up/to incite
焚き上げ: (たきあげ) - {Shinto} bonfire often in temple grounds, usu. of charms, talismans, New Year decorations, etc.; ritual burning of money, cedar sticks, or other objects as an offering
焚き付ける: (たきつける) - to kindle/to build a fire; to instigate/to stir up/to incite
焚き出し: (たきだし) - emergency rice feeding; distribution of rice after an emergency
焚き木: (たきぎ) - firewood/kindling/fuel; (usu. まき) piece(s) of firewood
焚き染める: (たきしめる) - to perfume clothes by burning incense
焚き火: (たきび) - open-air fire (e.g. for garden refuse)/bonfire; open fire (e.g. in a kitchen)
焚く: (たく) - to burn/to kindle/to build a fire; to heat (a bath, stove, etc.); to use (a camera flash)
焚上げ: (たきあげ) - {Shinto} bonfire often in temple grounds, usu. of charms, talismans, New Year decorations, etc.; ritual burning of money, cedar sticks, or other objects as an offering
焚刑: (ふんけい) - burning at the stake
焚掠: (ふんりゃく) - pillaging and setting fire to
焚書坑儒: (ふんしょこうじゅ) - (yoji) burning books on the Chinese classics and burying Confucian scholars alive
焚火: (たきび) - open-air fire (e.g. for garden refuse)/bonfire; open fire (e.g. in a kitchen)
焚火の間: (たきびのま) - room with a sunken hearth
焜炉: (コンロ) - portable cooking stove; gas burner
無: (mu/bu/na) - nothing , nothing, naught, nought, nil, zero; un-, non-
無い: (nai) - inexistente, não existente (lá); sem dono, não possuído, não tido; inexistente, não existente (lá); sem dono, não possuído, não tido; único; não, impossível, não vai acontecer
無いと: (ないと) - (after negative base of verb) have to (verb)/must (verb); is indispensable/absolutely necessary
無いといけない: (ないといけない) - (after negative base of verb) have to (verb)/must (verb); (esp. 無いといけない) is indispensable/absolutely necessary
無いといけません: (ないといけません) - (after negative base of verb) have to (verb)/must (verb); (esp. 無いといけません)  is indispensable/absolutely necessary
無いと行けない: (ないといけない) - (after negative base of verb) have to (verb)/must (verb); (esp. 無いといけない) is indispensable/absolutely necessary
無いと行けません: (ないといけません) - (after negative base of verb) have to (verb)/must (verb); (esp. 無いといけません)  is indispensable/absolutely necessary
無いより増し: (ないよりまし) - It's better than nothing
無い内に: (ないうちに) - (after neg. stem of verb) before it becomes (verb); before (an undesirable thing occurs)
無い物ねだり: (ないものねだり) - asking for the moon; asking for too much
無い袖は振れぬ: (ないそではふれぬ) - you can't give (use) what you don't have; nothing comes from nothing; you can't shake sleeves you don't have
無うなる: (のうなる) - to be lost (e.g. luggage)/to be missing; to be used up/to be run out/to be exhausted/to be consumed; to disappear (e.g. pain)/to be lost (e.g. a dream, confidence)
無かる: (なかる) - (from classical 無かり)  to not be; to be absent
無き: (なき) - -less (often used after one word to modify another, e.g. soulless body); lacking; non-existing
無きにしもあらず: (なきにしもあらず) - not non-existent; not completely lacking; there is some; certainly existent
無きにしも非ず: (なきにしもあらず) - not non-existent; not completely lacking; there is some; certainly existent
無きゃ: (なきゃ) - unless one .../if one does not ...; cannot do without something; (after negative base of verb) have to do
無きゃいけない: (なきゃいけない) - cannot do without something/indispensable/absolutely necessary; (after negative base of verb) have to do
無きゃならない: (なきゃならない) - cannot do without something/indispensable/absolutely necessary; (after negative base of verb)  have to do
無くして: (なくして) - without; in the event that it did not (or does not) exist
無くしては: (なくしては) - in the event that it did not (or does not) exist; without
無くす: (なくす) - to lose something; (usu. 無くす) to get rid of; (亡くす only) to lose someone (wife, child, etc.)
無くてはいけない: (なくてはいけない) - cannot do without something/indispensable/absolutely necessary; (after negative base of verb) have to do
無くてはならない: (なくてはならない) - cannot do without something/indispensable/absolutely necessary; (after negative base of verb) have to do
無くても: (なくても) - even if not; even without
無くても良い: (なくてもいい) - (after neg. stem of verb) need not (verb)/(not) have to/expressing absence of obligation or necessity; need not have/need not exist
無くて七癖: (なくてななくせ) - Every man has his own peculiar habits
無くなす: (なくなす) - to lose; to miss
無くなる: (なくなる) - to be lost (e.g. luggage)/to be missing; to be used up/to be run out/to be exhausted/to be consumed/to be reduced to zero/to not occur any more; to disappear (e.g. pain)/to be lost (e.g. a dream, confidence)
無くもがな: (なくもがな) - can be dispensed with; be better without; useless
無けなし: (なけなし) - very small amount which looks like nothing
無けりゃ: (なけりゃ) - unless one ...; if one does not ...
無ければ: (なければ) - if it does not exist/if it is not there/if it is not ...; unless one .../if one does not ...
無け無し: (なけなし) - very small amount which looks like nothing
無げ: (なげ) - appearing as if something doesn't exist; casual; offhand
無さそう: (なさそう) - does not seem; unlikely; improbable
無し: (なし) - without; (ant: 在り・あり・2) unacceptable/not alright/unsatisfactory
無しで済ます: (なしですます) - to do without
